member.name: T:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for .

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions.InitializeReceiveKuduWebHooks(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes support for receiving WebHooks generated by Kudu (Azure Web App Deployment Service). A sample WebHook URI is 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/kudu/{id}?code=83699ec7c1d794c0c780e49a5c72972590571fd8'. For security reasons the WebHook URI must be an https URI and contain a 'code' query parameter with the same value as configured in the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_Kudu' application setting, optionally using IDs to differentiate between multiple WebHooks, for example 'secret0, id1=secret1, id2=secret2'. The 'code' parameter must be between 32 and 128 characters long. For details about Kudu WebHooks, see https://github.com/projectkudu/kudu/wiki/Web-hooks.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions.InitializeReceiveAzureAlertWebHooks(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes support for receiving WebHooks generated by the Azure Alert Service. A sample WebHook URI is 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/azurealert/{id}?code=83699ec7c1d794c0c780e49a5c72972590571fd8'. For security reasons the WebHook URI must be an https URI and contain a 'code' query parameter with the same value as configured in the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_AzureAlert' application setting, optionally using IDs to differentiate between multiple WebHooks, for example 'secret0, id1=secret1, id2=secret2'. The 'code' parameter must be between 32 and 128 characters long. For details about Azure WebHooks, see https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/insights-webhooks-alerts/.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.AzureReceiverResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.AzureReceiverResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.AzureReceiverResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.AzureReceiverResources.Receiver_BadBody
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The HTTP request body did not contain a required '{0}' property..

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext
member.summary: Provides context information for a WebHook notification sent from Azure Alert Service.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique ID for this alert.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the alert.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the alert.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.ConditionType
member.summary: Gets or sets the condition type, e.g. 'Metric' or 'Event'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.SubscriptionId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Azure subscription ID.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.Timestamp
member.summary: Gets or sets the time at which the alert was triggered. The alert is triggered as soon as the metric is read from the diagnostics storage.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.Condition
member.summary: Gets or sets information about the condition causing the event.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.ResourceGroupName
member.summary: Gets or sets the resource group name of the impacted resource causing the alert.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.ResourceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the resource causing the alert.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.ResourceType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the impacted resource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.ResourceId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the resource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.ResourceRegion
member.summary: Gets or sets the geographic location of the resource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertContext.PortalLink
member.summary: Gets or sets a direct link to the resource summary page on the Azure portal.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertCondition
member.summary: Provides information about the condition under which the WebHook notification was sent from Azure Alert Service.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertCondition.MetricName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the metric that defines what the rule monitors.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertCondition.MetricUnit
member.summary: Gets or sets the units allowed in the metric, e.g. 'Bytes' and 'Percent'. See 'https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/microsoft.azure.insights.models.unit.aspx' for details.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertCondition.MetricValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the actual value of the metric that caused the event.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertCondition.Threshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the threshold value that activates the event.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertCondition.WindowSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the period of time that is used to monitor alert activity based on the threshold. The value is between 5 minutes and 1 day.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertCondition.TimeAggregation
member.summary: Gets or sets how the data is collection, e.g. 'Average' and 'Last'. See 'https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/microsoft.azure.insights.models.aggregationtype.aspx' for details.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertCondition.Operator
member.summary: Gets or sets the operator used to compare the data and the threshold.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertNotification
member.summary: Contains information sent in a WebHook notification from Azure Alert Service.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertNotification.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets the kind of alert. Azure automatically sends activated and resolved alerts for the condition sets. Examples of values include 'Activated' and 'Resolved'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertNotification.Context
member.summary: Gets or sets context information for this alert.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertNotification.Properties
member.summary: Gets a collection of additional properties for this alert.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertWebHookReceiver
member.summary: Provides an implementation which supports WebHooks generated by Azure Alert Service. A sample WebHook URI is 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/azurealert/{id}?code=83699ec7c1d794c0c780e49a5c72972590571fd8'. For security reasons the WebHook URI must be an https URI and contain a 'code' query parameter with the same value as configured in the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_AzureAlert' application setting, optionally using IDs to differentiate between multiple WebHooks, for example 'secret0, id1=secret1, id2=secret2'. The 'code' parameter must be between 32 and 128 characters long. For details about Azure WebHooks, see https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/insights-webhooks-alerts/.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.AzureAlertWebHookReceiver.ReceiverName
member.summary: Gets the receiver name for this receiver.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification
member.summary: Contains information sent in a WebHook notification from Kudu (Azure Web App Deployment Service).

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the WebHook.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets the status of the WebHook, e.g. success

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.StatusText
member.summary: Gets or sets the status text of the WebHook.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.AuthorEmail
member.summary: Gets or sets the email of the author generating the WebHook.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.Author
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the author generating the WebHook.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets a message contained within the WebHook.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.Progress
member.summary: Gets or sets a progress indication.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.Deployer
member.summary: Gets or sets the user name of the deployer causing the WebHook to be generated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.ReceivedTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time the operation was received by Kudu.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.StartTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time the operation was started by Kudu.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.EndTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time the operation was completed by Kudu.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.LastSuccessEndTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time the last successful operation was completed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.Complete
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the operation is complete.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduNotification.SiteName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the site the operation is targeting.

member.summary: Provides an implementation which supports WebHooks generated by Kudu (Azure Web App Deployment Service). A sample WebHook URI is 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/kudu/{id}?code=83699ec7c1d794c0c780e49a5c72972590571fd8'. For security reasons the WebHook URI must be an https URI and contain a 'code' query parameter with the same value as configured in the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_Kudu' application setting, optionally using IDs to differentiate between multiple WebHooks, for example 'secret0, id1=secret1, id2=secret2'. The 'code' parameter must be between 32 and 128 characters long. For details about Kudu WebHooks, see https://github.com/projectkudu/kudu/wiki/Web-hooks.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.KuduWebHookReceiver.ReceiverName
